about_the_game:
“Your happily ever after suddenly comes crashing down when the man you love can no longer cum without being ejaculated on by someone other than you!”

Shiro has just gotten married and is at the peak of his happiness,

One day, his wife Chihiro came down with a mysterious disease.

He is told that the only way to prolong his wife's life is to obtain semen directly from someone who qualifies.

For the two people in love, hell has begun. ......

Shiro finally explodes emotionally and takes action. ......?

[Tell Chihiro the truth - pleasure, violence, fear. My wife will be cuckolded in every possible way!]

After informing Chihiro and discussing the situation, the two decide to undergo treatment in order to stay together as long as possible.

But the man treating her is ......

a dirty, numb, ugly “otaku”.

A seemingly young, handsome, nice young man, but in reality a 'master in bed' who specializes in teasing, driving women crazy and trying to take them away from them

The last remaining middle-aged man looks serious, but is actually the worst kind of 'punk', toying with women with underhanded tactics and violence

Blood types are rare, and there are no other candidates than these guys. Either a geek, a techie, or a punk. It was hell no matter who was chosen! But if you don't choose, Chihiro will die!

■Characters

[Moriama Shirou]

The main character of this story is a 27-year-old company employee. Despite his busy schedule, he lives a full life with his beloved wife. He learns of Chihiro's condition from his doctor and is faced with the decision of whether or not to undergo unusual treatment.

[Moriama Chihiro

The heroine of this story, 23 years old. Married to Chihiro after graduating from college. Her introverted but stable personality and slender but curvy figure attracts the attention of many men, but she is ashamed of being too conspicuous and develops an inferiority complex. Due to this, her experience with men is very limited, and she has never dated any other men besides Shiro. As the story opens, she is unfortunate enough to suffer from a mysterious and strange disease, and Shiro's choices will determine whether or not the horrific treatment she suffers will be revealed.

.

・The men who assist in the treatment

[Takahiro Ueshima (Ueshima Takahiro)

A male with an untidy appearance and scruffy figure. He ignores the feelings of others, always thinking in his own self-interest, and is a virgin.

Azuma Kentarou (吾妻健太郎)

A well-groomed, easy-going and cheerful male who speaks and acts rashly. His age is similar to Chihiro's, and he seems to be very popular and experienced in dealing with women.

Tachihara Gen (太刀原玄)

A middle-aged scoundrel who has no qualms about using violence and threatening others.

content_descriptors.notes:
- Large portions of the game include nudity and graphic descriptions of sexual activities that feature female domination.
- There are scenes of sexual intercourse involving pregnant characters.
- Some scenes include characters engaging in non consensual sexual acts.
-All characters in the game are adults and do not contain content related to minors.
-Contains general sex and BDSM content

short_description: Shiro has just gotten married and is at the peak of happiness.One day, his wife Chihiro falls ill with a mysterious disease. The only way to prolong life is to directly introduce the semen of a person who meets the conditions into the body. A hellish day has begun for the two who love each other...
